#Import protein data
```{r read csv}
tmt <- read.csv("data/Leaf Paper Data 050520-processed.csv", stringsAsFactors = F)
#re-define protein column to shortened name
tmt <- tmt[,-182]
colnames(tmt)[182] <- "Protein"
#make new column for gene accession without transcript id
tmt$Gene <- substr(tmt$Accession, start = 1, stop = 14)
tmt.withPolymorphic <- tmt
#Remove polymorphic peptides
tmt <- tmt[-(grep("only", tmt$Accession)),]
#Convert to numeric
for(i in 1:170){
  tmt[,i] <- as.numeric(tmt[,i])
}
```

##Subset experiments
```{r T-test function}
ttestFun <- function(df, col1, col2){
  result <- NULL
  for(i in 1:(nrow(df))){
  v1 = (as.numeric(df[i, col1]))
  v2 = (as.numeric(df[i, col2]))
  t_test <- t.test(v1, v2, var.equal = TRUE)
  pval <- t_test$p.value
  result[i] <- pval
  }
  result
}
```
###original BxM SL
```{r format df}
#Subset
tmt.OG.SL <- tmt[,c(171:176,181:183,12:20)]
#Remove missing genes
tmt.OG.SL <- tmt.OG.SL[!is.na(tmt.OG.SL$SeedlingLeaf.B73.r1),]
#Calculate averages of bio reps
tmt.OG.SL$B73avg <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.SL[,10:12])
tmt.OG.SL$Mo17avg <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.SL[,13:15])
tmt.OG.SL$HYBavg <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.SL[,16:18])
tmt.OG.SL$MPavg <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.SL[,c(10:15)])
tmt.OG.SL$MP.1 <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.SL[,c(10,13)])
tmt.OG.SL$MP.2 <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.SL[,c(11,15)])
tmt.OG.SL$MP.3 <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.SL[,c(12,15)])
#calculate ratio
tmt.OG.SL$HYB.MP <- tmt.OG.SL$HYBavg/tmt.OG.SL$MPavg
#calculate t-test
tmt.OG.SL$Sig <- ttestFun(tmt.OG.SL, 16:18, 23:25)
#calculate log2(hyb/MP)
tmt.OG.SL$l2.BM.MP <- log2(tmt.OG.SL$HYB.MP)
#Calculate log2(B73/Mo17)
tmt.OG.SL$B73.Mo17 <- tmt.OG.SL$B73avg/tmt.OG.SL$Mo17avg
tmt.OG.SL$l2.B73.Mo17 <-log2(tmt.OG.SL$B73.Mo17)
saveRDS(tmt.OG.SL, "tmt.OG.SL")
```

###original BxM SL + acs
```{r format df}
#Subset
tmt.OG.acs.SL <- tmt[,c(171:176,181:183,12:20, 1:10)]
#Remove missing genes
tmt.OG.acs.SL <- tmt.OG.acs.SL[!is.na(tmt.OG.acs.SL$SeedlingLeaf.B73.r1),]
tmt.OG.acs.SL <- tmt.OG.acs.SL[!is.na(tmt.OG.acs.SL$B73.acs.B73.r1),]
#Calculate averages of bio reps - OG
tmt.OG.acs.SL$B73avg <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.acs.SL[,10:12])
tmt.OG.acs.SL$Mo17avg <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.acs.SL[,13:15])
tmt.OG.acs.SL$HYBavg <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.acs.SL[,16:18])
tmt.OG.acs.SL$MPavg <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.acs.SL[,c(10:15)])
tmt.OG.acs.SL$MP.1 <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.acs.SL[,c(10,13)])
tmt.OG.acs.SL$MP.2 <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.acs.SL[,c(11,15)])
tmt.OG.acs.SL$MP.3 <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.acs.SL[,c(12,15)])
#calculate ratio - OG
tmt.OG.acs.SL$HYB.MP <- tmt.OG.acs.SL$HYBavg/tmt.OG.acs.SL$MPavg
#Calculate averages of bio reps - acs
tmt.OG.acs.SL$acsB73avg <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.acs.SL[,19:23])
tmt.OG.acs.SL$ACSavg <- rowMeans(tmt.OG.acs.SL[,24:28])
#calculate ratio - acs
tmt.OG.acs.SL$acs.B73 <- tmt.OG.acs.SL$ACSavg/tmt.OG.acs.SL$acsB73avg
#calculate log(hyb/MP)
tmt.OG.acs.SL$l2.BM.MP <- log2(tmt.OG.acs.SL$HYB.MP)
#calculate log(acs/B73)
tmt.OG.acs.SL$l2.ACS.B73 <- log2(tmt.OG.acs.SL$acs.B73)
#save
saveRDS(tmt.OG.acs.SL, "tmt.OG.acs.SL")
```

```{r}

```
```{r}

```
```{r}
colnames(cpm.OG.SL) <- c("Gene", "B73.1", "B73.2", "B73.3", "Mo17.1", "Mo17.2", "Mo17.3", "BM.1", "BM.2", "BM.3")
```

```{r}
#Remove missing genes
cpm.OG.SL <- cpm.OG.SL[!(cpm.OG.SL$B73.1==0),]
cpm.OG.SL <- cpm.OG.SL[!(cpm.OG.SL$Mo17.1==0),]
cpm.OG.SL <- cpm.OG.SL[!(cpm.OG.SL$BM.1==0),]
#Calculate averages of bio reps
cpm.OG.SL$B73avg <- rowMeans(cpm.OG.SL[,2:4])
cpm.OG.SL$Mo17avg <- rowMeans(cpm.OG.SL[,5:7])
cpm.OG.SL$HYBavg <- rowMeans(cpm.OG.SL[,8:10])
cpm.OG.SL$MPavg <- rowMeans(cpm.OG.SL[,c(2:7)])
cpm.OG.SL$MP.1 <- rowMeans(cpm.OG.SL[,c(2,5)])
cpm.OG.SL$MP.2 <- rowMeans(cpm.OG.SL[,c(3,6)])
cpm.OG.SL$MP.3 <- rowMeans(cpm.OG.SL[,c(4,7)])
#calculate ratio
cpm.OG.SL$HYB.MP <- cpm.OG.SL$HYBavg/cpm.OG.SL$MPavg
#calculate log2(hyb/MP)
cpm.OG.SL$l2.BM.MP <- log2(cpm.OG.SL$HYB.MP)
#Calculate log2(B73/Mo17)
cpm.OG.SL$B73.Mo17 <- cpm.OG.SL$B73avg/cpm.OG.SL$Mo17avg
cpm.OG.SL$l2.B73.Mo17 <-log2(cpm.OG.SL$B73.Mo17)
saveRDS(cpm.OG.SL, "cpm.OG.SL")
```

##6H
```{r}
rna.6h <- readRDS("data/rn20b.rds")

rna.6h.th <- rna.6h$th
rna.6h.fcnts <- rna.6h$fcnts
rna.6h.salmon <- rna.6h$salmon
rna.6h.salmontranscript <- rna.6h$salmon_transcript
rna.6h.tl <- rna.6h$tl
rna.6h.tm <- rna.6h$tm
rna.6h.th_m <- rna.6h$th_m
rna.6h.tm_m <- rna.6h$tm_m
```
```{r}
#subset
rna.6h.tm_m.B73 <- rna.6h.tm_m[rna.6h.tm_m$SampleID=="s027",]
rna.6h.tm_m.Mo17 <- rna.6h.tm_m[rna.6h.tm_m$SampleID=="s037",]
rna.6h.tm_m.BM <- rna.6h.tm_m[rna.6h.tm_m$SampleID=="s029",]
#combine
cpm.6h.SL <- data.frame("Gene"=rna.6h.tm_m.B73$gid, "B73"=rna.6h.tm_m.B73$CPM, "Mo17"=rna.6h.tm_m.Mo17$CPM, "BM"=rna.6h.tm_m.BM$CPM)
#Remove genes not detected
cpm.6h.SL <- cpm.6h.SL[!cpm.6h.SL$B73==0,]
cpm.6h.SL <- cpm.6h.SL[!cpm.6h.SL$Mo17==0,]
cpm.6h.SL <- cpm.6h.SL[!cpm.6h.SL$BM==0,]
#Calculate log2 hybrid/MP values
cpm.6h.SL$l2.BM.MP <- log2(cpm.6h.SL$BM/(rowMeans(cpm.6h.SL[,2:3])))
#Calculate log2 parent/parent values
cpm.6h.SL$l2.B73.Mo17 <- log2(cpm.6h.SL$B73/cpm.6h.SL$Mo17)
#save
saveRDS(cpm.6h.SL, "cpm.6h.SL")
```

```{r}
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0014xB.MP <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0014xB/(rowMeans(cpm.ril.SL[,c(2,5)])))
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0014xM.MP <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0014xM/(rowMeans(cpm.ril.SL[,c(3,5)])))
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0016xB.MP <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0016xB/(rowMeans(cpm.ril.SL[,c(2,8)])))
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0016xM.MP <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0016xM/(rowMeans(cpm.ril.SL[,c(3,8)])))
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0021xB.MP <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0021xB/(rowMeans(cpm.ril.SL[,c(2,11)])))
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0021xM.MP <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0021xM/(rowMeans(cpm.ril.SL[,c(3,11)])))
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0317xB.MP <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0317xB/(rowMeans(cpm.ril.SL[,c(2,14)])))
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0317xM.MP <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0317xM/(rowMeans(cpm.ril.SL[,c(3,14)])))
#Calculate log2 parent/parent values
cpm.ril.SL$l2.B73.Mo17 <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$B73/cpm.ril.SL$Mo17)
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0014.B73 <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0014/cpm.ril.SL$B73)
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0014.Mo17 <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0014/cpm.ril.SL$Mo17)
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0016.B73 <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0016/cpm.ril.SL$B73)
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0016.Mo17 <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0016/cpm.ril.SL$Mo17)
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0021.B73 <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0021/cpm.ril.SL$B73)
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0021.Mo17 <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0021/cpm.ril.SL$Mo17)
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0317.B73 <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0317/cpm.ril.SL$B73)
cpm.ril.SL$l2.M0317.Mo17 <- log2(cpm.ril.SL$M0317/cpm.ril.SL$Mo17)
#save
saveRDS(cpm.ril.SL, "cpm.ril.SL")
```

###combine terms
```{r}
lightrxn.PSI.kc <- unique(c(KEGG.zma00195.PSI.v4,KEGG.zma00196.LHCI.v4, CornCycLightRxns.PSI))
grepPSI <- tmt.withPolymorphic[grep("Photosystem I |photosystem I ", tmt.withPolymorphic$Protein),]
lightrxn.PSI.kc <- unique(c(lightrxn.PSI.kc, grepPSI$Gene))

lightrxn.PSII.kc <- unique(c(KEGG.zma00195.PSII.v4,KEGG.zma00196.LHCII.v4, CornCycLightRxns.PSII))
grepPSII <- tmt.withPolymorphic[grep("Photosystem II |photosystem II ", tmt.withPolymorphic$Protein),]
lightrxn.PSII.kc <- unique(c(lightrxn.PSII.kc, grepPSII$Gene))

lightrxn.ETC.kc <- unique(c(KEGG.zma00195.ETC.v4, CornCycLightRxns.ETC))

lightrxn.b6f.k <- KEGG.zma00195.b6f.v4

lightrxn.NDH <- tmt.withPolymorphic[grep("NDH", tmt.withPolymorphic$Protein),]
lightrxn.NDH <- lightrxn.NDH$Gene[grep("subunit", lightrxn.NDH$Protein)]

lightrxn.ATPase.k <- KEGG.zma00195.ATPase.v4
grepATPsynthase <- tmt.withPolymorphic$Gene[grepl("ATP",tmt.withPolymorphic$Protein)&grepl("synthase",tmt.withPolymorphic$Protein)&grepl("chloropl",tmt.withPolymorphic$Protein)]
lightrxn.ATPase.k <- unique(c(lightrxn.ATPase.k,grepATPsynthase))

darkrxn.C4.c <- unique(c(CornCycC4NADP.C4, CornCycC4PEPCK.C4))

darkrxn.Calvin.kc <- unique(c(KEGG.zma00710.v4, CornCycCalvinCycle.CC))

darkrxn.Calvin.RubiscoSS <- c("Zm00001d052595", "Zm00001d004894")

NE.PtComplexes <- unique(c(lightrxn.PSI.kc,lightrxn.PSII.kc,lightrxn.b6f.k,lightrxn.NDH,lightrxn.ATPase.k, darkrxn.Calvin.RubiscoSS))
```

```{r}
lightrxn.PSII.kc <- unique(c(lightrxn.PSII.kc, OxyEvol))
```

##Plastid background
```{r}
#Import supplemental Table I from Friso et al. 2010
friso <- read.csv("data/Friso2010_SupTab1.csv", stringsAsFactors = F)
colnames(friso) <- as.character(friso[1,])
friso <- friso[-1,]
friso <- friso[friso$`best gene model (selected)`=="yes",]
friso$Gene <- substr(friso$Accession, start = 1, stop = 13)
#convert to v4 accessions
friso <- merge.data.frame(friso, mgdb[,c(1,11)], by.x = "Gene", by.y = "v3_gene_model")
friso.v4 <- friso$v4_gene_model
```

##Plastid-encoded
```{r}
#Plastid-encoded proteins
Pt<-tmt.withPolymorphic[grep("ZemaCp", tmt.withPolymorphic$Accession),]
#define list of plastid-encoded photosynthesis-associated genes
Pt.PS <- Pt$Gene[grep("psb|psa|ndh|rbc|pet|atp|ccs|cem", Pt$Protein)]
Pt.PS.PSI <- Pt$Gene[grep("psa", Pt$Protein)]
Pt.PS.PSII <- Pt$Gene[grep("psb", Pt$Protein)]
Pt.PS.NADH <- Pt$Gene[grep("ndh", Pt$Protein)]
Pt.PS.b6f <- Pt$Gene[grep("pet", Pt$Protein)]
Pt.PS.ATP <- Pt$Gene[grep("atp", Pt$Protein)]
Pt.PS.rubisco <- Pt$Gene[grep("rbc", Pt$Protein)]
Pt.Complexes <- c(Pt.PS.PSI,Pt.PS.PSII,Pt.PS.NADH,Pt.PS.b6f,Pt.PS.ATP,Pt.PS.rubisco)
#Plastid encoded ribosomal proteins (EnsemblPlants Annotation)
#get subset of Pt encoded genes annotated as ribosomal proteins
Pt.ribo <- Pt$Gene[grep("rps|rpl", Pt$Protein)]
#Plastid encoded RNA polymerases (EnsemblPlants Annotation)
Pt.rpo <- Pt$Gene[grep("rpo", Pt$Protein)]
#Define "other" as everything left
Pt.other <- Pt$Gene[!(Pt$Gene%in%c(Pt.PS.rubisco, Pt.Complexes, Pt.ribo, Pt.rpo))]
Pt <- Pt$Gene
```

###Ribosome
```{r}
Nuc.MtRibo <- tmt.withPolymorphic$Gene[grepl("ribosom", tmt.withPolymorphic$Protein)&grepl("mito", tmt.withPolymorphic$Protein)]
```
###Mito-encoded
```{r}
tmt.mt <- tmt.withPolymorphic[grep("ZeamMp", tmt.withPolymorphic$Accession),]

Mt.OxPhos <- tmt.mt$Gene[grep("nad|ndh|atp|cob|cox", tmt.mt$Protein)]
Mt.ribo <- tmt.mt$Gene[grep("rps|rpl|orf247", tmt.mt$Protein)]
Mt.other <- tmt.mt$Gene[!(tmt.mt$Gene%in%c(Mt.OxPhos, Mt.ribo))]
```

```{r read in gamer}
# Read in Maize GAMER GO dataset, which lists maize V4 accessions with all associated GO terms (Wimalanathan et al. 2018) downloaded from https://datacommons.cyverse.org/browse/iplant/home/shared/commons_repo/curated/Carolyn_Lawrence-Dill_maize-GAMER_maize.B73_RefGen_v4_Zm00001d.2_Oct_2017.r1/e.agg_data
GAMER <- read.delim("maize.B73.AGPv4.aggregate.gaf", sep = "\t", header = FALSE)
colnames(GAMER) <- c("db", "db_object_id", "db_object_symbol", "qualifier", "term_accession", "db_reference", "evidence_code", "with", "aspect", "db_object_name", "db_object_synonym", "db_object_type", "taxon", "date", "assigned_by", "annotation_extension", "gene_product_form_id")
gamer <- GAMER[-(1:2),]
gamer$GOterm <- AnnotationDbi::Term(as.character(gamer$term_accession))
```
```{r}
#merge gamer GO terms
tmt.GOI <- merge.data.frame(tmt.GOI, gamer[,c(2,18)], by.x = "Gene", by.y = "db_object_id", all.x = T, all.y = F)

#Convert duplicated rows into multiple columns for each GO term
tmt.GOI.w <- dcast(setDT(tmt.GOI), Accession~rowid(Accession, prefix="GOterm"), value.var="GOterm")

tmt.GOI <- merge.data.frame(tmt.GOI[,1:9], tmt.GOI.w, by.x = "Accession", by.y = "Accession")
tmt.GOI <- distinct(tmt.GOI)

#reorder
tmt.GOI <- tmt.GOI[,c(1:10,21,32,43,54,65,76,79,80,11:20,22:31,33:42,44:53,55:64,66:75,77:78)]
#Combine columns of each pathway into single column
tmt.GOI <- unite(tmt.GOI, "GOterm", GOterm1:GOterm71, sep = " // ")
```

```{r PlotPlastidMitoFun}
PlotPlastidMitoFun <- function(df, l2rows, RNAorProtein, lims){
##Scatterplot - plastid
###Set limits
df.lims <- df
df.lims[,l2rows][df.lims[,l2rows] <= -lims] <- -lims
df.lims[,l2rows][df.lims[,l2rows] >= lims] <- lims
###Set GOIs
df.lims.plastid <- df.lims

df.lims.plastid$Category <- "Other"
df.lims.plastid$Order <- 1

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$friso.v4),"Category"] <- "Plastid"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$friso.v4),"Order"] <- 2

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Nuc.PtRibo),"Category"] <- "NE plastid ribosome"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Nuc.PtRibo),"Order"] <- 3

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Pt.ribo),"Category"] <- "PE plastid ribosome"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Pt.ribo),"Order"] <- 4

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$NE.PtComplexes),"Category"] <- "NE digenomic complexes"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$NE.PtComplexes),"Order"] <- 5

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Pt.Complexes),"Category"] <- "PE digenomic complexes"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Pt.Complexes),"Order"] <- 6
###Re-order
df.lims.plastid <- df.lims.plastid[(order(df.lims.plastid$Order)),]
###remove "other"
df.lims.plastid <- df.lims.plastid[!df.lims.plastid$Category=="Other",]
###factor
df.lims.plastid$Category <- factor(df.lims.plastid$Category, levels = c("Plastid", "NE plastid ribosome","PE plastid ribosome", "NE digenomic complexes", "PE digenomic complexes"))
###Scatterplot
df.lims.plastid.scat <- ggplot(df.lims.plastid, mapping=aes(x=l2.BM.MP, y=l2.B73.Mo17, color=Category))+
    geom_point(aes(color=Category), size=2.5, alpha=0.8)+
  scale_color_manual(values=c("Plastid"="#000000", "PE plastid ribosome"="#b66dff", "NE plastid ribosome"="#920000", "PE digenomic complexes"="#24ff24", "NE digenomic complexes"="#009292"), name="Category")+
    theme_classic()+
          xlim(c(-lims,lims))+
          ylim(c(-lims,lims))+
          geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray50")+
          geom_hline(yintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray50")+
          theme(axis.text=element_text(size=10), legend.text=element_text(size=10),
                legend.position="bottom", legend.title = element_blank())+
          guides(col=guide_legend(nrow=3))+
    xlab("log2 BxM/MP")+
    ylab("log2 B73/Mo17")+
    coord_fixed(expand = F)
###Add density curves
    densityplotX<-axis_canvas(df.lims.plastid.scat, axis="x")+
      geom_density(aes(df.lims.plastid[,"l2.BM.MP"], color=df.lims.plastid[,"Category"]), size=0.7)+
    scale_color_manual(values=c("Plastid"="#000000", "PE plastid ribosome"="#b66dff", "NE plastid ribosome"="#920000", "PE digenomic complexes"="#24ff24", "NE digenomic complexes"="#009292"), name="Category")+
      geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray50")+
      theme_void()+
      theme(legend.title = element_blank())
    #set up marginal density plot Y axis
    densityplotY<-axis_canvas(df.lims.plastid.scat, axis="y", coord_flip = T)+
      geom_density(aes(df.lims.plastid[,"l2.B73.Mo17"], color=df.lims.plastid[,"Category"]), size=0.7)+
      scale_color_manual(values=c("Plastid"="#000000", "PE plastid ribosome"="#b66dff", "NE plastid ribosome"="#920000", "PE digenomic complexes"="#24ff24", "NE digenomic complexes"="#009292"), name="Category")+
      scale_linetype_manual(values=c("dotted", "solid"))+
      geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray50")+
      theme_void()+
      theme(legend.title = element_blank())+
      coord_flip()
    #put two plots together
      q <- insert_xaxis_grob(df.lims.plastid.scat, densityplotX, grid::unit(0.275, "null"), position = "top")
      q <- insert_yaxis_grob(q, densityplotY, grid::unit(0.275, "null"), position = "right")
    #save
     # ggsave(plot=q, filename = "df.lims.plastid.scat.png")
  ggsave(plot=q, filename = paste0("Plots/Plastid/", RNAorProtein, "/", deparse(substitute(df)), ".plastid.scat.pdf"),  dpi=300, width=4.75, height = 5, scale = 1, units = "in")

df.lims.mito$Category <- "Other"
df.lims.mito$Order <- 1

df.lims.mito[(df.lims.mito$Gene %in% wangv4),"Category"] <- "Mitochondria"
df.lims.mito[(df.lims.mito$Gene %in% wangv4),"Order"] <- 2

df.lims.mito[(df.lims.mito$Gene %in% GOIs$OxPhos),"Category"] <- "NE oxidative phosphorylation"

df.lims.mito[(df.lims.mito$Gene %in% GOIs$Nuc.MtRibo),"Category"] <- "NE mitochondrial ribosome"

###Re-order
df.lims.mito <- df.lims.mito[(order(df.lims.mito$Order)),]
###remove "other"
df.lims.mito <- df.lims.mito[!df.lims.mito$Category=="Other",]
###factor
df.lims.mito$Category <- factor(df.lims.mito$Category, levels = c("Mitochondria", "NE oxidative phosphorylation", "ME oxidative phosphorylation", "NE mitochondrial ribosome", "ME ribosome"))
###Scatterplot
df.lims.mito.scat <- ggplot(df.lims.mito, mapping=aes(x=l2.BM.MP, y=l2.B73.Mo17, color=Category))+
    geom_point(aes(color=Category), size=3, alpha=0.8)+
  scale_color_manual(values=c("Mitochondria"="#000000", "ME ribosome"="#009E73", "NE mitochondrial ribosome"="#56B4E9", "ME oxidative phosphorylation"="#CC79A7", "NE oxidative phosphorylation"="#E69F00"), name="Category")+
    theme_classic()+
          xlim(c(-lims,lims))+
          ylim(c(-lims,lims))+
          geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray50")+
          geom_hline(yintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray50")+
          theme(axis.text=element_text(size=10), legend.text=element_text(size=10),
                legend.position="bottom", legend.title = element_blank())+
          guides(col=guide_legend(nrow = 3))+
    xlab("log2 BxM/MP")+

###Add density curves
    densityplotX<-axis_canvas(df.lims.mito.scat, axis="x")+

    #set up marginal density plot Y axis
```

```{r get_legend}
get_legend<-function(myggplot){
  tmp <- ggplot_gtable(ggplot_build(myggplot))
  leg <- which(sapply(tmp$grobs, function(x) x$name) == "guide-box")
  legend <- tmp$grobs[[leg]]
  return(legend)
}
```

```{r PlotPlastidPanelFun}
    #put two plots together

          dpi=300, width=4.75, height=5)  
}
```

```{r PlotMitoPanelFun}
  r<-patchwork::wrap_plots(A=plotList[[1]], B=plotList[[2]], C=plotList[[3]], E=plotList[[4]], nrow = 3, heights = c(3,3,1.2), design = des)
  }
  ggsave(plot=r, filename =paste0("Plots/Mitochondria/", RNAorProtein, "/", deparse(substitute(plotDF)),".mito.", "Xlim", limX, ".Ylim", limY, ".pdf"), dpi=300, width=4.75, height=5)  
}
```

```{r PlotEthyleneFun}
PlotEthyleneFun <- function(df){
##Plastid
###Set limits
df.lims <- df
df.lims[,c(40:41)][df.lims[,c(40:41)] <= -1.0] <- -1.0
df.lims[,c(40:41)][df.lims[,c(40:41)] >= 1.0] <- 1.0

###Set GOIs
df.lims.et <- df.lims

df.lims.et$Category <- "Other"
df.lims.et$Order <- 1

df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% friso.v4),"Category"] <- "Plastid"
df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% friso.v4),"Order"] <- 2

df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% Nuc.PtRibo),"Category"] <- "NE plastid ribosome"
df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% Nuc.PtRibo),"Order"] <- 3

df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% Pt.ribo),"Category"] <- "PE plastid ribosome"
df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% Pt.ribo),"Order"] <- 4

df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% NE.PtComplexes),"Category"] <- "NE digenomic complexes"
df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% NE.PtComplexes),"Order"] <- 5

df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% Pt.Complexes),"Category"] <- "PE digenomic complexes"
df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% Pt.Complexes),"Order"] <- 6

df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% EtBio),"Category"] <- "Ethylene biosynthesis"
df.lims.et[(df.lims.et$Gene %in% EtBio),"Order"] <- 7
###Re-order
df.lims.et <- df.lims.et[(order(df.lims.et$Order)),]
###remove "other"
df.lims.et <- df.lims.et[!df.lims.et$Category=="Other",]
###factor
df.lims.et$Category <- factor(df.lims.et$Category, levels = c("Plastid",  "NE plastid ribosome","PE plastid ribosome", "NE digenomic complexes", "PE digenomic complexes", "Ethylene biosynthesis"))
##Scatterplot
df.lims.et.scat <- ggplot(df.lims.et, mapping=aes(x=l2.BM.MP, y=l2.ACS.B73, color=Category))+
    geom_point(aes(color=Category), size=2.5, alpha=0.8)+
  scale_color_manual(values=c("Plastid"="#000000", "PE plastid ribosome"="#b66dff", "NE plastid ribosome"="#920000", "PE digenomic complexes"="#24ff24", "NE digenomic complexes"="#009292", "Ethylene biosynthesis"="#db6d00"), name="Category")+
    theme_classic()+
          xlim(c(-1,1))+
          ylim(c(-1,1))+
          geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray50")+
          geom_hline(yintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray50")+
          theme(axis.text=element_text(size=10), legend.text=element_text(size=10),
                legend.position="bottom", legend.title = element_blank())+
          guides(col=guide_legend(nrow=3))+
    xlab("log2 BxM/MP")+
    ylab("log2 acs/B73")+
    coord_fixed(expand = F)
###Add density curves
    densityplotX<-axis_canvas(df.lims.et.scat, axis="x")+
      geom_density(aes(df.lims.et[,"l2.BM.MP"], color=df.lims.et[,"Category"]), size=0.7)+
    scale_color_manual(values=c("Plastid"="#000000", "PE plastid ribosome"="#b66dff", "NE plastid ribosome"="#920000", "PE digenomic complexes"="#24ff24", "NE digenomic complexes"="#009292", "Ethylene biosynthesis"="#db6d00"), name="Category")+
      geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray50")+
      theme_void()+
      theme(legend.title = element_blank())
    densityplotY<-axis_canvas(df.lims.et.scat, axis="y", coord_flip = T)+
      geom_density(aes(df.lims.et[,"l2.ACS.B73"], color=df.lims.et[,"Category"]), size=0.7)+
      scale_color_manual(values=c("Plastid"="#000000", "PE plastid ribosome"="#b66dff", "NE plastid ribosome"="#920000", "PE digenomic complexes"="#24ff24", "NE digenomic complexes"="#009292", "Ethylene biosynthesis"="#db6d00"), name="Category")+
      scale_linetype_manual(values=c("dotted", "solid"))+
      geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray50")+
      theme_void()+
      theme(legend.title = element_blank())+
      coord_flip()
###put two plots together
      q <- insert_xaxis_grob(df.lims.et.scat, densityplotX, grid::unit(0.275, "null"), position = "top")
      q <- insert_yaxis_grob(q, densityplotY, grid::unit(0.275, "null"), position = "right")
###save
  ggsave(plot=q, filename = paste0("Plots/Ethylene/", deparse(substitute(df)), ".et.scat.pdf"), dpi=300, width=4.75, height = 5, scale = 1, units = "in")
}
```

```{r PlotEthylenePanelFun}
PlotEthylenePanelFun<-function(plotDF, RNAorProtein, limX, limY){
  colors <- c("Plastid"="black", "PE plastid ribosome"="#ef73ef", "NE plastid ribosome"="#a742da", "PE digenomic complexes"="#7ae281", "NE digenomic complexes"="#009fa7", "Ethylene biosynthesis"="#fab5bd")
  plot<-unique(plotDF[,"plot"])
  plotList<-vector(mode = "list", length = length(plot))
  plotLab<-unique(plotDF[,"plot"])
  for(i in 1:length(plot)){
    df<-plotDF[which(plotDF[,"plot"]==plot[i]),]
    ###Set limits
df.lims <- df
df.lims$l2.BM.MP[df.lims$l2.BM.MP <= -limX] <- -limX
df.lims$l2.BM.MP[df.lims$l2.BM.MP >= limX] <- limX

df.lims$l2.ACS.B73[df.lims$l2.ACS.B73 <= -limY] <- -limY
df.lims$l2.ACS.B73[df.lims$l2.ACS.B73 >= limY] <- limY
###Set GOIs
df.lims.plastid <- df.lims

df.lims.plastid$Category <- "Other"
df.lims.plastid$Order <- 1

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$friso.v4),"Category"] <- "Plastid"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$friso.v4),"Order"] <- 2

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$NE.PtComplexes),"Category"] <- "NE digenomic complexes"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$NE.PtComplexes),"Order"] <- 3

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Nuc.PtRibo),"Category"] <- "NE plastid ribosome"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Nuc.PtRibo),"Order"] <- 4

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Pt.ribo),"Category"] <- "PE plastid ribosome"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Pt.ribo),"Order"] <- 5

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Pt.Complexes),"Category"] <- "PE digenomic complexes"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$Pt.Complexes),"Order"] <- 6

df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$EtBio),"Category"] <- "Ethylene biosynthesis"
df.lims.plastid[(df.lims.plastid$Gene %in% GOIs$EtBio),"Order"] <- 7

###Re-order
df.lims.plastid <- df.lims.plastid[(order(df.lims.plastid$Order)),]
###remove "other"
df.lims.plastid <- df.lims.plastid[!df.lims.plastid$Category=="Other",]
###factor
df.lims.plastid$Category <- factor(df.lims.plastid$Category, levels = c("Plastid", "NE digenomic complexes", "NE plastid ribosome", "PE plastid ribosome", "PE digenomic complexes", "Ethylene biosynthesis"))
    #scatter plot with marginal density curves
    df.lims.plastid.scat <- ggplot(df.lims.plastid, mapping=aes(x=l2.BM.MP, y=l2.ACS.B73, color=Category, shape=Category))+
    geom_point(aes(color=Category), size=1)+
  scale_color_manual(values=colors, name="Category")+
      scale_shape_manual(values=c(1,19,19,19,19,19))+
    theme_classic()+
      xlim(c(-limX,limX))+
      ylim(c(-limY,limY))+
      geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray60", size=0.5)+
      geom_hline(yintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray60", size=0.5)+
      xlab("log2 BxM/MP")+
      ylab("log2 acs/B73")+
      ggtitle(plotLab[i])+
      theme(aspect.ratio=1)+
      coord_fixed(expand = F)+
      theme(plot.margin=grid::unit(c(-3,-3,0,-3), "mm"))+
      theme(axis.text=element_text(size=10), legend.text=element_text(size=10),
        legend.position="bottom", legend.title = element_blank(), plot.title = element_text(vjust = -3.5, hjust = -0.485), axis.text.x = element_text(size = 9), axis.text.y = element_text(size = 9), legend.spacing.x = unit(0.1, 'cm'), legend.spacing.y = unit(-3, 'cm'))+
      guides(col=guide_legend(nrow = 3))

legend <- get_legend(df.lims.plastid.scat)
    df.lims.plastid.scat <- df.lims.plastid.scat+theme(legend.position = "none")
###Add density curves
    densityplotX<-axis_canvas(df.lims.plastid.scat, axis="x")+
      geom_density(aes(df.lims.plastid[,"l2.BM.MP"], color=df.lims.plastid[,"Category"]), size=0.5)+
    scale_color_manual(values=colors, name="Category")+
      geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray60", size=0.5)+
      theme_void()+
      theme(legend.title = element_blank())+
      theme(plot.margin=grid::unit(c(-3,-3,0,-3), "mm"))
    #set up marginal density plot Y axis
    densityplotY<-axis_canvas(df.lims.plastid.scat, axis="y", coord_flip = T)+
      geom_density(aes(df.lims.plastid[,"l2.ACS.B73"], color=df.lims.plastid[,"Category"]), size=0.5)+
      scale_color_manual(values=colors, name="Category")+
      scale_linetype_manual(values=c("dotted", "solid"))+
      geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "gray60", size=0.5)+
      theme_void()+
      theme(legend.title = element_blank())+
      coord_flip()+
      theme(plot.margin=grid::unit(c(-2,-2,0,-2), "mm"))
    #put two plots together
      q <- insert_xaxis_grob(df.lims.plastid.scat, densityplotX, grid::unit(0.275, "null"), position = "top")
      q <- insert_yaxis_grob(q, densityplotY, grid::unit(0.275, "null"), position = "right")
    if(i==1){
      plotList<-list()
      plotList[[1]]<-q
    }
    else{
      plotList <- c(plotList, list(q))
    }
  }
  plotList <- c(plotList, list(legend))
  if(RNAorProtein=="Protein"){
  des <- "AB
          CD
          EE"
  r<-patchwork::wrap_plots(A=plotList[[1]], B=plotList[[2]], C=plotList[[3]], D=plotList[[4]], E=plotList[[5]], nrow = 3, heights = c(3,3,1.2), design = des)
  }
  else{
    des <- "AB
            C#
            EE"
  r<-patchwork::wrap_plots(A=plotList[[1]], B=plotList[[2]], C=plotList[[3]], E=plotList[[4]], nrow = 3, heights = c(3,3,1.2), design = des)
  }
  ggsave(plot=r, filename =paste0("Plots/Ethylene/", deparse(substitute(plotDF)),".ethylene.", "Xlim", limX, ".Ylim", limY, ".pdf"),
          dpi=300, width=4.75, height=5)  
}
```
